infos.value: Grrraaa...ahhh......
Are we actually done with it this time?
Rain, Fina... Mont, Machérie...
You have done well to defeat the malboro.
Your deeds have expelled that which threatened to consume this world.
I see... That's a relief.
Will of Light, what happened to these malboro?
They are likely a mutation which resulted from regular malboro consuming some form of abhorrent matter.
By defeating them, I believe the influence of that matter will also be dispelled.
Okay... I guess that takes care of things, then.
This means the miasma should go away, too, right?
Yes, it will be so. I thank you deeply for your efforts.
You don't have to thank us. I'll always do what I can to help those in need. As a Knight of Grandshelt!
I am of the same mind. If my strength can save someone, I will always go to them.
He may not be like your Rain, but Mont is a man of surprising dependability, do you not agree?
Yeah! You were both really something back there!
As were you and Rain. It was clear to me throughout the battle that you two are bound by a deep bond.
A deep bond... I'm happy you see us that way.
Looks like we'll be parting ways soon.
Rain, Fina. It was good to fight by your side. I hope we cross paths again someplace...
Me, too! Take care Mont, Machérie!
As I stated earlier, you needn't worry for us. May you be safe in your travels.
We couldn't have taken down the malboro without all four of us working together. Thanks.
I can't wait for the day we can fight by each other's sides again!
Their combined efforts have rid the Farplane of that which threatened to consume it...
Yet what is this unease that lingers with my very being...?
Brave warriors...
May you use the light which you bear to guide your world to peaceful times...
